lead_paragraph: BUSSEL--Irving, died November 1, 2014. He was born on July 17, 1926 in Plainfield, NJ. His parents were the late Max and Sarah Bussel. Irving attended New York University and the New School of Social Research. He was a Research Editor for the Anti Defamation League in New York for over 40 years. He is survived by a brother, Eli Bussell of Edison, NJ, a sister, Roselyn Ramist of Stamford, CT, and nieces and nephews Lisa, Frank, Joanne, Lauren, and Jordan.
